radios.name: Radio Paradise
radios.description: Blend of many styles and genres of music, carefully selected and mixed by two real human beings. You'll hear modern and classic rock, world music, electronica, even a bit of classical and jazz.

radios.name: Radio Gibson
radios.description: Italian no-profit web radio, all genres.

radios.name: XRDS.fm
radios.description: Blues, Roots and American music from The Crossroads, in Clarksdale, Mississippi.

radios.name: Play Emotions
radios.description: Lounge, chillout, ambient. Perfect for relaxing.

radios.name: Ambient Sleeping Pill
radios.description: Internet radio streaming music for sleep, meditation or study; for tuning out distractions or simply relaxing; ad-free, beat-free, never too new-age or dark

radios.name: Jamendo Lounge
radios.description: Kicking off the night drinking cocktails with friends? Enjoying the sun at the beach bar, sipping on some cool refreshment? Play the Lounge Radio, let yourself be carried away by these delightful rhythms and immerse yourself in smooth electronic vibrations, both chilled out and rousing.

radios.name: Jazz Lovers
radios.description: The SRG SSR jazz radio, with JAZZ, SOUL and BLUES 24/7.

radios.name: KEXP
radios.description: KEXP is more than a radio station. KEXP is a dynamic arts organization that provides rich music experiences on the air, online, and on the streets.

radios.name: Radio 3 Classica
radios.description: Webradio digitale italiana di musica classica che propone ogni giorno un repertorio di musica antica, barocca, da camera, sinfonica, lirica e contemporanea

radios.name: Radio Deejay
radios.description: Deejay.it ti sorprende, ti diverte, ti commuove. Radio, video, audio, musica e le migliori storie scelte per te e raccontate dai deejay del web
